title: Immersive Market Participants
description: Schema for immersive-market-participants-extended.csv â€“ a curated list of organisations, venues, artists, festivals and other actors in the immersive media ecosystem.

id.description: Stable unique identifier for the participant (slug-style, lowercase, no spaces).

name.description: Canonical name of the market participant.

category.description: Primary category describing the participant's role in the immersive ecosystem, e.g. Technology, Agency, Artist, Event, Venue, Association, Festival, Distributor, Other.

subcategories.description: Optional comma-separated list of additional roles or subcategories, e.g. "Production studio, Realtime content".

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the primary base of operations, e.g. "US", "DE", "JP".

region.description: World region or macro-area, such as "Europe", "North America", "Latin America", "Asia-Pacific", "MENA".

city.description: Primary city of operation or headquarters, if known.

latitude.description: Latitude of the participant's primary location in WGS84 decimal degrees. Null if not available.

longitude.description: Longitude of the participant's primary location in WGS84 decimal degrees. Null if not available.

website.description: Official website URL for the participant.

description_short.description: One-line neutral summary of the participant's role in the immersive ecosystem.

description_long.description: Optional extended description with more context on activities, history and formats.

formats.description: Optional comma-separated list of core immersive formats, e.g. "Fulldome, XR", "Projection mapping", "Immersive theatre".

tags.description: Optional comma-separated list of keywords for search and grouping, e.g. "LBE, Location-based entertainment, LED dome".

founded_year.description: Year the participant was founded or first publicly active, if known.

status_active.description: True if the participant is currently active; false if it is closed, inactive or historical.

source.description: Primary source from which the entry was created or confirmed, e.g. "Immersive Events Whitepaper".

source_url.description: URL of the main reference used when curating this entry (official site, festival page, institutional profile, etc.).

last_verified.description: Date when this entry was last manually checked (YYYY-MM-DD). Null if not yet tracked.

notes.description: Free-text notes about curation decisions, edge cases or partial information.
